Catalog.sol:Catalog.devdoc: {"author":"Orlando Leombruni","methods":{"checkLeaveFeedback(address)":{"params":{"addr":"The address of the content."}},"checkPaymentAvailable(address)":{"params":{"addr":"The address of the content contract to check"}},"collectPayment(address)":{"params":{"addr":"The address of the content (management) contract whose views produced              the payment."}},"feedbackAvailable()":{"return":"An array of descriptions and an array of addresses           for the contents with the above property."},"getContent(bytes32)":{"params":{"cont":"the unique description for this content"},"return":"the address of the paid content."},"getContentAddress(bytes32)":{"params":{"cont":"the unique description for the content"},"return":"the content's address"},"getContentList()":{"return":"an array containing the descriptions of all published contents, in          order of publication (oldest first)."},"getContentPremium(bytes32)":{"params":{"cont":"the unique description for this content"},"return":"the address of the requested content."},"getCreatorContentList()":{"return":"two arrays, one that contains the description for the desired contents          and the other one that contains their address.          The elements in these arrays refer to the same content if they share the same index."},"getLatestByAuthor(bytes32)":{"params":{"x":"the requested author"},"return":"the description of the latest content of the author x, if any."},"getLatestByGenre(bytes32)":{"params":{"x":"the requested genre"},"return":"the description of the latest content with genre x, if any."},"getMostPopularByAuthor(bytes32)":{"params":{"x":"the requested author"},"return":"the description of the most popular content of the author x, if any.the desired content's description"},"getMostPopularByGenre(bytes32)":{"params":{"x":"the requested genre"},"return":"the description of the most popular content with genre x, if any."},"getMostRated()":{"return":"the desired content's description"},"getMostRated(uint256)":{"params":{"y":"the desired category, can be 0"},"return":"the desired content's description"},"getMostRatedByAuthor(bytes32)":{"params":{"x":"the desired author"},"return":"the desired content's description"},"getMostRatedByAuthor(bytes32,uint256)":{"params":{"x":"the desired author","y":"the desired category, can be 0"},"return":"the desired content's description"},"getMostRatedByGenre(bytes32)":{"params":{"x":"the desired genre"},"return":"the desired content's description"},"getMostRatedByGenre(bytes32,uint256)":{"params":{"x":"the desired genre","y":"the desired category, can be 0"},"return":"the desired content's description"},"getNewContentsList(uint256)":{"params":{"x":"the number of requested newest contents."},"return":"an array containing the descriptions of all requested contents, in          reverse order of publication (newest first)."},"getPremiumPrice()":{"return":"the premium subscription's price."},"getStatistics()":{"return":"five arrays: four for information (description/genre/author/price) about the contents published          in the catalog, and another that contains the number of views for these contents.           The elements in these arrays refer to the same content if they share the same index,          i.e. the content with description contList[i] has viewList[i] views."},"giftContent(bytes32,address)":{"params":{"cont":"the unique description for this content"},"return":"the address of the paid content."},"giftPremium(address)":{"params":{"user":"the user that will receive the premium subscription/extension."}},"grantsAvailable()":{"return":"An array of descriptions for the contents with the above property."},"hasAccess(address)":{"params":{"user":"the user to be checked"},"return":"true if the user has access to the calling content, false otherwise   "},"isPremium(address)":{"params":{"x":"the address of the user to be checked."},"return":"whether the user with address x has an active subscription."},"leaveFeedback(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"appreciation":"value for the appreciation index","content":"address of the content to provide feedback for","fairness":"value for the fairness index","suggest":"value for the likeliness to suggest index"}},"put_content(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,address)":{"params":{"auth":"the content's author","desc":"the unique description for the content","gen":"the content's genre","own":"the address of the content's owner (to be used for payments)"}}},"title":"A catalog to allow authors to publish and grant access to their contents."}
Catalog.sol:Catalog.userdoc: {"methods":{"buyPremium()":{"notice":"Starts a new premium subscription, or extends the duration of the current one.    *   Estimated gas cost: 42875 (Remix estimation) + the cost of transferring the change  Note: the cost is lower if a premium subscription was bought before, even if it's currently        expired. (This is because a mapping already exists on the storage.)You need to pay at least `premiumPrice * premiumTime` wei."},"checkLeaveFeedback(address)":{"notice":"Checks if the user can leave feedback for a content."},"checkPaymentAvailable(address)":{"notice":"Tells the owner of a content if there's any payment available.  "},"closeCatalog()":{"notice":"Closes the catalog, redistributing its balance to all published contents  proportionally to the views of each content. Only the catalog owner can  invoke this operation.    *   Note that if no content has a single view, any balance is equally redistributed  as a fallback case.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~32000, plus ~1400 per content, plus the cost                       of transferring balance to each content."},"collectPayment(address)":{"notice":"Allows the owner of a content to collect any available payment.  Every available payment awards the owner of the content (payableViews * price), plus  a fixed portion of the subscriptions revenue.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~48000 + cost for transfer of funds   "},"feedbackAvailable()":{"notice":"Returns the list of contents for which feedback can be left by the user."},"getContent(bytes32)":{"notice":"Pays for access to content 'cont'.    Estimated gas cost: 45191 (Remix estimation) + the cost of transferring the changeYou need to pay at least `price` wei."},"getContentAddress(bytes32)":{"notice":"Given the description of a content, returns its address.    *   Estimated gas cost: 1192 (Remix estimation)  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"getContentList()":{"notice":"Returns the list of contents without the number of views.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~800 if the list is empty, plus ~800 for each additional                      content published in the catalogue.  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"getContentPremium(bytes32)":{"notice":"Requests access to content 'cont' without paying, premium accounts only.    Estimated gas cost: 22521 (Remix estimation)."},"getCreatorContentList()":{"notice":"Returns the list of contents that belong to the sender (as the creator)."},"getLatestByAuthor(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the most recent content of the author 'x'.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~600 if the list is empty, plus ~830 for each scanned                      content  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"getLatestByGenre(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the most recent content with genre 'x'.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~600 if the list is empty, plus ~830 for each scanned                      content  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"getMostPopularByAuthor(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the content with most views of the author 'x'.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~620 if the list is empty, plus ~830 for each scanned                      content  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"getMostPopularByGenre(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the content with genre 'x', which has received the maximum number of views.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~620 if the list is empty, plus ~830 for each scanned                      content  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"getMostRated()":{"notice":"Returns the content with highest average of all ratings."},"getMostRated(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the content with highest rating for feedback category y,   or highest average of all ratings if y is 0.Feedback categories are: 1 for the \"content appreciation\" category,           2 for the \"price fairness\" category,           3 for the \"likeliness to suggest content to other users\" category;          0 for the content with highest average of all ratings."},"getMostRatedByAuthor(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the content with author 'x' having the highest average of all ratings."},"getMostRatedByAuthor(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the content with highest rating for feedback category y with author x,  or highest average of all ratings if y is 0.Feedback categories are: 1 for the \"content appreciation\" category,           2 for the \"price fairness\" category,           3 for the \"likeliness to suggest content to other users\" category;          0 for the content with highest average of all ratings."},"getMostRatedByGenre(bytes32)":{"notice":"Returns the content of genre 'x' with highest average of all ratings."},"getMostRatedByGenre(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the content with highest rating for feedback category y with genre x,  or highest average of all ratings if y is 0.Feedback categories are: 1 for the \"content appreciation\" category,           2 for the \"price fairness\" category,           3 for the \"likeliness to suggest content to other users\" category;          0 for the content with highest average of all ratings."},"getNewContentsList(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the list of 'x' newest contents.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~850 if the list is empty, plus ~850 for each additional                      content requested (up to the number of published contents).  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"getPremiumPrice()":{"notice":"Returns the price of a standard premium subscription."},"getStatistics()":{"notice":"Returns the number of views for each content.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~1000 if the list is empty, plus ~1100 for each additional                      content published in the catalogue.  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"giftContent(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Pays for granting access to content 'cont' to the user 'user'.    Estimated gas cost: 45119 (Remix estimation) + the cost of transferring the change"},"giftPremium(address)":{"notice":"Pays for granting a Premium Account to the user 'user' (or extend its duration).    *   Estimated gas cost: 42643 (Remix estimation) + the cost of transferring the change  Note: the cost is lower if a premium subscription was bought before for user 'user',         even if such subscription is currently expired.         (This is because a mapping already exists on the storage.)You need to pay at least `premiumPrice * premiumTime` wei."},"grantsAvailable()":{"notice":"Returns the list of contents for which the user has obtained paid (non-premium) access grants."},"hasAccess(address)":{"notice":"Checks that an user has access to the content; if so, it revokes the  grant and returns true, else it returns false.  This function must be called from the content's management contract;  it uses 'msg.sender' to guarantee that no other entity can revoke a  valid grant.    *   Estimated gas cost: 64353 (Remix estimation)Calling this function from outside a contract does nothing."},"isActiveCatalog()":{"notice":"Basic function used in the frontend to check if catalog is still active."},"isPremium(address)":{"notice":"Returns true if 'x' holds a still valid premium account, false otherwise.    *   Estimated gas cost: 790 (Remix estimation)  Note: the gas cost is only paid if this function is called inside a non-view        function in another contract."},"leaveFeedback(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Allows an user to leave feedback for a content it has consumed.The user must have consumed the content."},"put_content(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Adds a content to the list, effectively publishing it to the catalog system.    Estimated gas cost: 173142 (Remix estimation)  Note: actual gas cost is usually less, depending on the size of the three bytes32 parameter  "},"remove_content()":{"notice":"Removes a content from the list."}}}

ContentManagementBase.sol:ContentManagem.devdoc: {"author":"Orlando Leombruni","methods":{"publish(address)":{"params":{"a":"the address of the Catalog where the content will be published"}}},"title":"A contract that manages paid accesses to a resource."}
ContentManagementBase.sol:ContentManagem.userdoc: {"methods":{"closeContract()":{"notice":"Closes this contract, removing the content from the provided Catalog and transferring all the funds  to the contract's owner."},"consumeContent()":{"notice":"Provides the content to an user, after checking that the user has indeed  obtained authorization to consume it.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~1800 + the cost of calling Catalog.hasAccess(user).Make sure you've obtained access rights to this content."},"isActiveContent()":{"notice":"Basic function used in the frontend to check if catalog is still active."},"publish(address)":{"notice":"Publishes the content to the specified Catalog.    *   Estimated gas cost: 41137 (Remix estimation) + the cost of calling Catalog.put_content(...)."}}}

MusicContent.sol:MusicContent.devdoc: {"author":"Orlando Leombruni","methods":{"publish(address)":{"params":{"a":"the address of the Catalog where the content will be published"}}},"title":"A \"dummy\" contract to show how a ContentManagementBase could be extended."}
MusicContent.sol:MusicContent.userdoc: {"methods":{"closeContract()":{"notice":"Closes this contract, removing the content from the provided Catalog and transferring all the funds  to the contract's owner."},"consumeContent()":{"notice":"Provides the content to an user, after checking that the user has indeed  obtained authorization to consume it.    *   Estimated gas cost: ~1800 + the cost of calling Catalog.hasAccess(user).Make sure you've obtained access rights to this content."},"isActiveContent()":{"notice":"Basic function used in the frontend to check if catalog is still active."},"publish(address)":{"notice":"Publishes the content to the specified Catalog.    *   Estimated gas cost: 41137 (Remix estimation) + the cost of calling Catalog.put_content(...)."}}}
